attributes.action: Make No 10 Downing Street fully accessible for wheelchair users
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Despite the current Government's introduction of amendments to the Disability Discrimination Act 1995 to protect those of us who are disabled being discriminated against, wheelchair users visiting No 10 have to use a back entrance and lift into Leo Blair's nursery!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
